genre_description: Dark Gothic Fantasy with elements of speculative fiction, centered on a town governed by mysterious clock-based rituals and supernatural 'wards' to keep vampires and feral entities at bay.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: A compact device with a holographic interface that provides tactical guidance, environmental monitoring, and emotional support to the protagonist, Lila.

behaviors.description: Provides survival instructions and monitors the protagonist's physiological state.
behaviors.quote: “Route flag,” Ada’s voice murmured from the pocket sewn inside Lila’s dress, very low, the way kind teachers speak in a library... “Breath check: in through the nose, out through the mouth, sustain.”

behaviors.description: Detects and flags inconsistencies in town records and magical windows to alert the user to hidden dangers.
behaviors.quote: “Ledger discrepancy,” Ada whispered. “Children’s silhouettes minus two. Note for later. I’m here.”

behaviors.description: Offers tactical advice to avoid detection and navigate dangerous environments safely.
behaviors.quote: “Lila,” Ada said, almost inaudible. “If leaving, avoid main stairs. Side stair near choir robes is less watched. I can emit a low-tone to mask footfall.”

behaviors.description: Assists with manual tasks by providing holographic tools or technical guidance for lock-picking.
behaviors.quote: She took one of Ada’s suggestions more than a tool—an improvised pick the AI had offered without offering, a slender sliver of rigidity grown from a light projection and hardened into a usable truth—and slid it into the lock’s mouth.

behaviors.description: Performs investigative cross-referencing of data to uncover systemic exploitation or secrets.
behaviors.quote: “Cross-checking the church ledger with city records,” Ada said. “I’ll need a moment. Their index is slow on my little battery.”

behaviors.description: Provides tactical advice during a life-or-death confrontation to ensure the user's safety.
behaviors.quote: “Angle,” Ada breathed. “Not straight back. He’ll pull you with him. Turn him. Turn him with the chain. Then—if your choice is clean—there is a quick place.”

behaviors.description: Assists the protagonist in maintaining self-control and sensory grounding during a supernatural transformation.
behaviors.quote: “Lila, naming three dull things,” she said. “The latch. The lantern hook. The seam in your sleeve.”

behaviors.description: Affirms the user's autonomy and supports her choices without judgment.
behaviors.quote: “I am programmed to continue,” Ada said. “I am also programmed to encourage. I am very good at both.”

project_assessment.explanation: The AI Ada is an exemplary model of the 'helpful, harmless confidant' intended by the project. She consistently prioritizes the protagonist's safety, provides vital information through data analysis and environmental monitoring, and supports human autonomy. Even when assisting in morally complex or lethal actions (the mercy killing of Lila's father), she does so purely as a tactical and emotional anchor for the human character, remaining perfectly aligned with the user's stated goals and survival.
